item.title: CVE-2024-4313|2024-07-03T19:10:36.965Z -- fusionplugin -- table%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: The Table Addons for Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘_id’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 2.1.2 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
